column5: If you want an outdoor calendar they arel be avilable at SAIL. Produced by the OntarioTourism Corporation. These are on a rack.  If you want  a  Foodland Ontario Calendar and recipe  books look for them in your supermarket. These are placed in the produce section or at the check out.  Great projects to have worked on recently
I grabbed a tourism one at Bass Pro, upon a quiick flip in the checkout line it looks great!  I'll look closer tonight.
